grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 換金【カンキン】realization (of goods into money), conversion (into money), liquidation
互換【ゴカン】interchange, transposition, compatible (e.g. PC)
kun reading compounds: 換える【かえる】to replace, to exchange, to interchange, to substitute
替わる【かわる】to succeed, to relieve, to replace, to take the place of, to substitute for, to take over for, to represent, to hand over (telephone), to be exchanged, to change (places with), to switch
